Introduction to Esports
Module 3: Expanding Career and College Opportunities

Exploration

Spend no more than 10 minutes exploring the resource below to gain a better understanding of esports opportunities offered at the Michigan collegiate level.

As you explore, consider the following questions:

  • Were you aware these programs existed?
  • Do you know someone involved in these programs?
  • What additional questions do you have about these programs?
  • If you visit the program websites, can you determine if they offer scholarships, special degrees or programs?
